item.description:
Hi, we will be having a Camp Fire party with a indoor social get-together combined with a game night so bring some simple games to play. We will be touring my futuristic home, it is half built, building the other half the "Dome" this summer, so come out for the tour and if you want stay for the food and game night.

We will be having another meetup club there so there will be plenty of people!

(We were going to have a skating party but there is too much snow on the pond behind my parents house to so I'm changing it to a bonfire party.) We will be meeting at 6 pm, in Durham, bring plenty of food for a pot luck dinner. The party is at my parents home.

Please park out on the street. Bring something to cook on the fire if you like.
If you have any questions give me a call at 603-509-2907.
See you there!
Peter.
item.name: Party / Game Night/ Dome Home / Meeting
